DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate overall efficacy aripiprazole intramuscular ( IM ) depot acute treatment subject schizophrenia . The secondary purpose evaluate safety tolerability aripiprazole IM depot administer every 4 week 12 week adult subject schizophrenia .
